full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement: Request for Proposal

#### Project Title
Employee Assistance and Wellness Program Services (EAP)

#### Tender Reference and Solicitation Number

* Tender Reference: PW-23-01021624
* Solicitation Number: 5000068763

#### Notice Publication and Tender Closing Dates

* Notice Publication Date: January 16, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: February 27, 2023 (2:00 PM EST)

#### Contract Duration and Notice Type

* Expected Contract Start Date: April 1, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2024 (with options to extend for additional one-year periods)
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)

#### Solicitation Description

The Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission (CNSC) is seeking proposals for Employee Assistance and Wellness Program Services (EAP) under a contract with a duration of one year, renewable for additional one-year periods. The objective of this RFP is to obtain high-quality services that complement the CNSC’s existing employee assistance program and provide comprehensive support to employees.

#### Key Requirements

* Provide EAP services such as clinical services, advisory services, trauma, critical incident, and crisis management, extended wellness solutions, prevention services, promotional services, program evaluation and statistical reporting, and program satisfaction surveys
* Ensure that the services address hybrid and traditional workplace wellness, including diversity and accessibility considerations
* No security requirement necessary
* The contractor must demonstrate an understanding of the CNSC’s existing employee assistance program and its services

#### Additional Information

The solicitation documents are available on the Canada Buys website. The tender description can be found in the attachment section below.

#### Supporting Documents

The following documents are available for download:

* EAP RFP (English): [link to PDF]
* EAP NPP (English): [link to ZIP]
* Amendment 001 to the DDP (English): [link to ZIP]
* Response to Question and Answer (Q&A) Set 1 (English): [link to ZIP]
* Response to Q&A Set 2 (English): [link to ZIP]
* Response to Q&A Set 3 (English): [link to ZIP]

#### Contact Information

For any questions or clarifications regarding this solicitation, please contact:

* Jessica Brutus
* Email: solicitation-demandedesoumission@cnsc-ccsn.gc.ca
* Phone: 343-550-6808
* Fax: (not required)
